description: This recipe is the Moet Ringmaster Recipe, a drink that makes us feel like the circus comes to town and reminds everyone of the hit family movie The Greatest Showman. The formula is easy to make, and it always brings back memories of our childhood.
name: Moet Ringmaster

recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients except the Moet into a shaker. Shake vigorously.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients except the Moet into a shaker. Shake vigorously.

recipeInstructions.name: Add Moet and only shake for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Add Moet and only shake for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Double strain the mixture in a highball glass and serve. To double pressure, attach the bar strainer to the shaker, then pour it into a glass through a wire strainer.
recipeInstructions.text: Double strain the mixture in a highball glass and serve. To double pressure, attach the bar strainer to the shaker, then pour it into a glass through a wire strainer.

recipeInstructions.name: For a pretty garnish, remove the sections of lemon and lime slices. Be sure the lemon fits into the lime ring.
recipeInstructions.text: For a pretty garnish, remove the sections of lemon and lime slices. Be sure the lemon fits into the lime ring.

recipeInstructions.name: Insert an orange slice into the center of the lemon ring, so it appears to be multi-colored.
recipeInstructions.text: Insert an orange slice into the center of the lemon ring, so it appears to be multi-colored.
